channel.title: CVE Feed for GNOME Project -- G Structured File Library (libgsf)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GNOME Project -- G Structured File Library (libgsf)

item.title: CVE-2024-42415|2024-10-03T17:17:40.368Z -- gnome%20project -- g%20structured%20file%20library%20%28libgsf%29
item.description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the Compound Document Binary File format parser of v1.14.52 of the GNOME Project G Structured File Library (libgsf). A specially crafted file can result in an integer overflow that allows for a heap-based buffer overflow when processing the sector allocation table. This can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-36474|2024-10-03T17:20:03.996Z -- gnome%20project -- g%20structured%20file%20library%20%28libgsf%29
item.description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the Compound Document Binary File format parser of the GNOME Project G Structured File Library (libgsf) version v1.14.52. A specially crafted file can result in an integer overflow when processing the directory from the file that allows for an out-of-bounds index to be used when reading and writing to an array. This can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-36474|2024-10-03T15:24:46.204Z -- gnome%20project -- g%20structured%20file%20library%20%28libgsf%29

This can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.
